Description of incident: W.P Technology (dba Wattpad) informed customers of a cyber attack to their system that may have compromised customer information.The information compromised included email addresses, Wattpad passwords, Tumblr usernames and passwords, last login IP, and other user profile information provided.The company is recommending that their customers change their Wattpad password and your Tumblr password. For questions contact security@wattpad.comMore Information: http://oag.ca.gov/ecrime/databreach/reports/sb24-57318
